Select, evaluate, and make decisions on proposals from external solution providers and consulting companies in terms of their effectiveness and usefulness.
Establish and contribute to internal communities of practice to shape the generative AI tech-stack of Covestro.
analysis: While the job responsibilities do not explicitly mention continuous integration and delivery, overseeing the lifecycle of generative AI products and supporting them in the operational phase implies a need for streamlined feature releases and maintaining high software quality, which are key aspects of CI/CD practices.
